short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and share links as a Kanban board

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Net is a companion to Netaverse (https://netaver.se), which lets you organize links as a Kanban board.

Left click the add-on icon to save your current tab to your topmost board.
Right click the add-on icon to save your current window as a link group.
